title: Hacked Accounts, Massive Information Leak
body:
I have a ticket open, but this is a time pressing issue.

I found a website online with like 40 people's usernames and passwords on it, and it's recent. Can any rioters speed my ticket up?

replies.body: Thanks for sending in a ticket about this.  I can check on the status for you, what's the ticket number?
Thanks!  Your ticket is in queue, but I pinged our account team as well  to give a heads up.  Have you changed your password/updated your info?

I changed the password on this account so it isn't the same, but I'd have no idea how to recover the one that was compromised, nor would their be much of a point since I've been using this one for a while. It's unfortunate that I lost the champions, skins, and playtime on that account, though. Leveling to 30 a second time took ages.

Any idea how long this will take to get looked at? That's a lot of user information sitting in the open. Not to mention the website also has user information for several other companies.

All is not lost, if you have an account to recover our specialists can help you with that in your ticket.  I don't have an eta on when you'll get a reply as it's still in queue, but the report itself has been received and being investigated.  I won't be able to offer more updates on that, esp through a public venue like the boards.
